function.name: Gdp Message Sent
function.description: This function is called by the RF4CE Profile plugin when a GDP message is sent.

arg.name: pairingIndex
arg.description: The index of the entry in the pairing table used to transmit the message.

arg.name: vendorId
arg.description: The vendor ID included in the message.

arg.name: message
arg.description: A pointer to the payload of the message that was sent.

arg.name: messageLength
arg.description: The length in bytes of the message.

arg.name: status
arg.description: An ::EmberStatus value.

function.name: Remote Control 1 1 Message Sent
function.description: This function is called by the RF4CE Profile plugin when a Remote Control 1.0 or 1.1 message is sent.

arg.name: pairingIndex
arg.description: The index of the entry in the pairing table used to transmit the message.

arg.name: vendorId
arg.description: The vendor ID included in the message.

arg.name: message
arg.description: A pointer to the payload of the message that was sent.

arg.name: messageLength
arg.description: The length in bytes of the message.

arg.name: status
arg.description: An ::EmberStatus value.

function.name: Gdp Incoming Message
function.description: This function is called by the RF4CE Profile plugin when a GDP message is received.

arg.name: pairingIndex
arg.description: The index of the entry in the pairing table corresponding to the PAN on which the message was received.

arg.name: vendorId
arg.description: The vendor ID included in the message.

arg.name: message
arg.description: A pointer to the payload of the received message.

arg.name: messageLength
arg.description: The length in bytes of the received message.

function.name: Remote Control 1 1 Incoming Message
function.description: This function is called by the RF4CE Profile plugin when a Remote Control 1.0 or 1.1 message is received.

arg.name: pairingIndex
arg.description: The index of the entry in the pairing table corresponding to the PAN on which the message was received.

arg.name: vendorId
arg.description: The vendor ID included in the message.

arg.name: message
arg.description: A pointer to the payload of the received message.

arg.name: messageLength
arg.description: The length in bytes of the received message.

function.description: This function is called by the RF4CE Profile plugin when a ZRC 2.0 message is received.

arg.name: pairingIndex
arg.description: The index of the entry in the pairing table corresponding to the PAN on which the message was received.

arg.name: vendorId
arg.description: The vendor ID included in the message.

arg.name: message
arg.description: A pointer to the payload of the received message.

arg.name: messageLength
arg.description: The length in bytes of the received message.

function.name: Mso Incoming Message
function.description: This function is called by the RF4CE Profile plugin when an MSO message is received.

arg.name: pairingIndex
arg.description: The index of the entry in the pairing table corresponding to the PAN on which the message was received.

arg.name: vendorId
arg.description: The vendor ID included in the message.

arg.name: message
arg.description: A pointer to the payload of the received message.

arg.name: messageLength

function.name: Remote Control 1 1 Discovery Request
function.description: This function is called by the RF4CE Profile plugin when an discovery request is received from a for the Remote Control 1.1 profile.

arg.name: ieeeAddr
arg.description: The IEEE address of the requesting device.

arg.name: nodeCapabilities
arg.description: The capabilities of the requesting device.

arg.name: vendorInfo
arg.description: The vendor information of the requesting device.

arg.name: appInfo
arg.description: The application information of the requesting device.

arg.name: searchDevType
arg.description: The device type requested.

arg.name: rxLinkQuality
arg.description: The LQI of the request.

function.name: Mso Discovery Request
function.description: This function is called by the RF4CE Profile plugin when an discovery request is received from a node for the MSO profile.

arg.name: ieeeAddr
arg.description: The IEEE address of the requesting device.

arg.name: nodeCapabilities
arg.description: The capabilities of the requesting device.

arg.name: vendorInfo
arg.description: The vendor information of the requesting device.

arg.name: appInfo
arg.description: The application information of the requesting device.

arg.name: searchDevType
arg.description: The device type requested.

arg.name: rxLinkQuality
arg.description: The LQI of the request.

function.name: Gdp Discovery Request
function.description: This function is called by the RF4CE Profile plugin when an discovery request is received from a node for the GDP profile.

arg.name: ieeeAddr
arg.description: The IEEE address of the requesting device.

arg.name: nodeCapabilities
arg.description: The capabilities of the requesting device.

arg.name: vendorInfo
arg.description: The vendor information of the requesting device.

arg.name: appInfo
arg.description: The application information of the requesting device.

arg.name: searchDevType
arg.description: The device type requested.

arg.name: rxLinkQuality
arg.description: The LQI of the request.

function.name: Remote Control 1 1 Discovery Response
function.description: This function is called by the RF4CE Profile plugin when an discovery response is received from a node that supports the Remote Control 1.1 profile.

arg.name: atCapacity
arg.description: TRUE if the node sending the discovery response has no free entry in its pairing table, FALSE otherwise.

arg.name: channel
arg.description: The channel on which the discovery response was received.

arg.name: panId
arg.description: The PAN identifier of the responding device.

arg.name: ieeeAddr
arg.description: The IEEE address of the responding device.

arg.name: nodeCapabilities
arg.description: The capabilities of the responding device.

arg.name: vendorInfo
arg.description: The vendor information of the responding device.

arg.name: appInfo
arg.description: The application information of the responding device.

arg.name: rxLinkQuality
arg.description: The LQI of the discovery response.

arg.name: discRequestLqi
arg.description: The LQI of the discovery request command frame reported by the responding device.

function.name: Mso Discovery Response
function.description: This function is called by the RF4CE Profile plugin when an discovery response is received from a node that supports the MSO profile.

arg.name: atCapacity
arg.description: TRUE if the node sending the discovery response has no free entry in its pairing table, FALSE otherwise.

arg.name: channel
arg.description: The channel on which the discovery response was received.

arg.name: panId
arg.description: The PAN identifier of the responding device.

arg.name: ieeeAddr
arg.description: The IEEE address of the responding device.

arg.name: nodeCapabilities
arg.description: The capabilities of the responding device.

arg.name: vendorInfo
arg.description: The vendor information of the responding device.

arg.name: appInfo
arg.description: The application information of the responding device.

arg.name: rxLinkQuality
arg.description: The LQI of the discovery response.

arg.name: discRequestLqi
arg.description: The LQI of the discovery request command frame reported by the responding device.

function.name: Gdp Discovery Response
function.description: This function is called by the RF4CE Profile plugin when an discovery response is received from a node that supports the GDP profile.

arg.name: atCapacity
arg.description: TRUE if the node sending the discovery response has no free entry in its pairing table, FALSE otherwise.

arg.name: channel
arg.description: The channel on which the discovery response was received.

arg.name: panId
arg.description: The PAN identifier of the responding device.

arg.name: ieeeAddr
arg.description: The IEEE address of the responding device.

arg.name: nodeCapabilities
arg.description: The capabilities of the responding device.

arg.name: vendorInfo
arg.description: The vendor information of the responding device.

arg.name: appInfo
arg.description: The application information of the responding device.

arg.name: rxLinkQuality
arg.description: The LQI of the discovery response.

arg.name: discRequestLqi
arg.description: The LQI of the discovery request command frame reported by the responding device.

function.name: Remote Control 1 1 Discovery Complete
function.description: This function is called by the RF4CE Profile plugin when the discovery process has completed.

arg.name: status
arg.description: An ::EmberStatus value indicating whether the discovery succeeded or the failure reason.

function.name: Mso Discovery Complete
function.description: This function is called by the RF4CE Profile plugin when the discovery process has completed.

arg.name: status
arg.description: An ::EmberStatus value indicating whether the discovery succeeded or the failure reason.

function.name: Gdp Discovery Complete
function.description: This function is called by the RF4CE Profile plugin when the discovery process has completed.

arg.name: status
arg.description: An ::EmberStatus value indicating whether the discovery succeeded or the failure reason.

function.name: Remote Control 1 1 Auto Discovery Response Complete
function.description: This function is called by the RF4CE Profile plugin when the auto discovery response process has completed.

arg.name: status
arg.description: An ::EmberStatus value indicating whether the discovery succeeded or the failure reason.

arg.name: srcIeeeAddr
arg.description: The IEEE address of the node from which the discovery request command frame was received. This parameter is meaningful only if the status parameter is EMBER_SUCCESS

arg.name: nodeCapabilities
arg.description: The node capabilities of the node that issued the discovery request. This parameter is meaningful only if the status parameter is EMBER_SUCCESS.

arg.name: vendorInfo
arg.description: A pointer to an ::EmberRf4ceVendorInfo struct containing the vendor information of the node that issued the discovery request. This parameter is non-NULL only if the status parameter is EMBER_SUCCESS.

arg.name: appInfo
arg.description: A pointer to an ::EmberRf4ceApplicationInfo struct containing the application information of the node that issued the discovery request. This parameter is non-NULL only if the status parameter is EMBER_SUCCESS.

arg.name: searchDevType
arg.description: The device type being discovered. If this is 0xFF, any type is being requested. This parameter is meaningful only if the status parameter is EMBER_SUCCESS.

function.name: Mso Auto Discovery Response Complete
function.description: This function is called by the RF4CE Profile plugin when the auto discovery response process has completed.

arg.name: status
arg.description: An ::EmberStatus value indicating whether the discovery succeeded or the failure reason.

arg.name: srcIeeeAddr
arg.description: The IEEE address of the node from which the discovery request command frame was received. This parameter is meaningful only if the status parameter is EMBER_SUCCESS

arg.name: nodeCapabilities
arg.description: The node capabilities of the node that issued the discovery request. This parameter is meaningful only if the status parameter is EMBER_SUCCESS.

arg.name: vendorInfo
arg.description: A pointer to an ::EmberRf4ceVendorInfo struct containing the vendor information of the node that issued the discovery request. This parameter is non-NULL only if the status parameter is EMBER_SUCCESS.

arg.name: appInfo
arg.description: A pointer to an ::EmberRf4ceApplicationInfo struct containing the application information of the node that issued the discovery request. This parameter is non-NULL only if the status parameter is EMBER_SUCCESS.

arg.name: searchDevType
arg.description: The device type being discovered. If this is 0xFF, any type is being requested. This parameter is meaningful only if the status parameter is EMBER_SUCCESS.

function.name: Remote Control 1 1 Pair Request
function.description: This function is called by the RF4CE Profile plugin when an a pair request is received from a node that supports the Remote Control 1.1 profile.

arg.name: status
arg.description: An ::EmberStatus value indicating whether the pairing is a new pairing, a duplicate or if the pairing table is full.

arg.name: pairingIndex
arg.description: The index of the entry that will be used by the stack for the pairing link.

arg.name: sourceIeeeAddr
arg.description: The source IEEE address of the incoming pair request.

arg.name: nodeCapabilities
arg.description: The node capabilities of the node that issued the pair request.

arg.name: vendorInfo
arg.description: The vendor information of the requesting device.

arg.name: appInfo
arg.description: The application information of the requesting device.

arg.name: keyExchangeTransferCount
arg.description: The number of transfers to be used to exchange the link key with the pairing originator.

function.name: Mso Pair Request
function.description: This function is called by the RF4CE Profile plugin when an a pair request is received from a node that supports the MSO profile.

arg.name: status
arg.description: An ::EmberStatus value indicating whether the pairing is a new pairing, a duplicate or if the pairing table is full.

arg.name: pairingIndex
arg.description: The index of the entry that will be used by the stack for the pairing link.

arg.name: sourceIeeeAddr
arg.description: The source IEEE address of the incoming pair request.

arg.name: nodeCapabilities
arg.description: The node capabilities of the node that issued the pair request.

arg.name: vendorInfo
arg.description: The vendor information of the requesting device.

arg.name: appInfo
arg.description: The application information of the requesting device.

arg.name: keyExchangeTransferCount
arg.description: The number of transfers to be used to exchange the link key with the pairing originator.

function.name: Remote Control 1 1 Pair Complete
function.description: This function is called by the RF4CE Profile plugin when the pairing process has completed.

arg.name: status
arg.description: An ::EmberStatus value indicating whether the pairing succeeded or the failure reason.

arg.name: pairingIndex
arg.description: The index of the pairing table entry corresponding to the pairing link that was established during the pairing process.

function.name: Mso Pair Complete
function.description: This function is called by the RF4CE Profile plugin when the pairing process has completed.

arg.name: status
arg.description: An ::EmberStatus value indicating whether the pairing succeeded or the failure reason.

arg.name: pairingIndex
arg.description: The index of the pairing table entry corresponding to the pairing link that was established during the pairing process.
